string-array.name: gameHelpAndInstructions
string-array.item: \t When the "Game" button is pressed, you will see a layout of grey panels.
\t In the top right, you will see the number of Poke Balls you want to find.
\t In the top left, you will see the number of \"performed\" scans.
\t To scan for Poke Balls, click on a blank panel.
\t When clicked, the panel will either reveal a Poke Ball, or a number.
\t This number reveals how many Poke Balls are in the same row or same column as the \"scanned\" place.
\t Use this info strategically to find all your hidden Poke Balls in the least scans possible!
